images.caption: Figure 1:SAGE unleashes the efficient reasoning potential of LRMs obscured by pass@1 and identifies the optimal completions within the model‚Äôs capability hidden in pass@k. By enabling LRMs to learn these efficient reasoning patterns, SAGE-RL-tuned models simultaneously enhance reasoning capacity and conciseness on multiple challenging mathematical benchmarks.
